headline.main: NAZIS GOT WARSHIPS FROM FRENCH IN TUNIS; Germans Threatened to Massacre Crews in Ultimatum

lead_paragraph: LONDON, March 1 (AP) -- Fighting French headquarters said today it had received a document disclosing that the Germans obtained control of a small squadron of French warships stationed at Tunis through a threat to massacre all personnel down "to the last officer and man."
abstract: London Fighting French sources reveal Gers obtained control of French warships at Tunis by giving Adm Esteva ultimatum threatening massacre of entire ships personnel; many French sailors and marines deserted before Esteva surrender
